sourcesContent:
Contacts
import { Component, OnInit, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../contact.model'; import { ContactService } from '../contact.service'; @Component({ selector: 'cms-contact-list', templateUrl: './contact-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-list.component.css'], }) export class ContactListComponent implements OnInit { contacts: Contact[] = []; constructor(private contactSevice: ContactService) {} ngOnInit() { this.contacts = this.contactSevice.getContacts(); } onSelected(contact: Contact) { this.contactSevice.contactSelectedEvent.emit(contact); } }
